title: Oman issues urgent warning after man swims with killer whale
summary_full: Oman's Environment Authority has issued a stern warning against diving near orcas following a viral video of a man swimming close to the powerful marine predators. The advisory emphasises the unpredictable nature and immense strength of these wild animals, stressing that such close encounters pose serious risks to both human lives and wildlife wellbeing.
